char * shmat ( int  shmid,
key_t *  semid 
)

Attaches the current process to the shmid shared memory.

Parameters:
shmid The id of the shared memory segment.
semid A pointer to a key_t variable where to store the shared memory inner semaphore id.
Returns:
A pointer to the shared memory space.
See also:
shmget() shmdt()

Detaches the current process form the shmid shared memory segment.

Parameters:
shmid The id of the shared memory segment.
Returns:
0 on success, -1 on error.

int  size 
)

Gets a new shared memory with the given key and size.

Parameters:
key The key for the shared memory segment.
size The shared memory size.
Returns:
The id of the shared memory on success, -1 on error.
